document_data.caption: Umar bin Farid
document_data.name: Tufala bint Maneira
document_data.mainbody: '''Umar bin Farid''' was a [[dwarf]] and the adoptive son of an influential [[Zakharan (ethnicity)|Zakharan]] merchant named [[Farid]] in [[Hiyal]] around [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}{{Cite card/AD&D Trading Cards/1993|53|[[Umar bin Farid]]}}
document_data.History: Originally from [[Qudra]], Umar was forced to flee the city under mysterious circumstances or be slain as his parents were.
document_data.Activites: Umar was fiercely loyal and protective of his adoptive father. He protected him during a blood feud with a desert clan called the [[House of Al-Karim]].
document_data.Possessions: Umar wielded a ''[[scimitar of speed]]'' and a ''[[jambiya]]''. He typically wore [[leather armor]].
